title: *Important* *New Patch Problems* About Leaverbuster!!! Please Read.
body:
**Someone Can Help me Fix my Game. I Updated to New Client (new Patch) (with all the Training Tools and Stuffs.) and i was Put into 20mins. Leaverbuster which is i don't know how it Happens, So the main Problem is when i Queued up for a New Game it starts the 20 mins. Countdown, and when the the Time is Finished, it never Found me a Game.... no errors, no disconnection Errors, no Anything. not even a single sign, and everything just Came Back to the start... i clicked it 3 times now, and That's worth 3 games. but i never found a Match.. So Can Someone in the Makers of this Game Fix it? or Maybe Someone Can Teach me to Rollback My Update? -_- I'm Quite Disappointed.**
****
_p.s Sorry for my Bad English, I'm not a Native English speaker_. ****

replies.body:
Is this happening in both the Legacy Client **and** the Beta Client? Try launching into the Legacy Client (from login) and let me know if you experience the same behavior across both clients:

https://i.imgur.com/drrzBd9.png

Let me know if this caused any change.
